<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// calculate the Usr memory pointer, e.g. NumUserOperands, the operator</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Placement delete - required by std, called if the ctor throws.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user/#acb6e60cad24aed54fa19ce71074c7ecb"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">operator</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">delete</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Usr, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/user/intrusiveoperandsanddescriptorallocmarker">IntrusiveOperandsAndDescriptorAllocMarker</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: If a subclass manipulates the information which is required to calculate the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Usr memory pointer, e.g. NumUserOperands, the operator delete of that subclass has</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to restore the changed information to the original value, since the dtor of that class</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is not called if the ctor fails.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">    User::operator </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">delete</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(Usr);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Subclasses with hung off uses need to manage the operand count</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// themselves.  In these instances, the operand count isn&#39;t used to find the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// OperandList, so there&#39;s no issue in having the operand count change.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Drop all references to operands.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This function is in charge of &quot;letting go&quot; of all objects that this User</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// refers to.  This allows one to &#39;delete&#39; a whole class at a time, even</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// though there may be circular references...  First all references are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// dropped, and all use counts go to zero.  Then everything is deleted for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// real.  Note that no operations are valid on an object that has &quot;dropped</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// all references&quot;, except operator delete.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user/#a48ec5fcee6d2c17c723e8e67f169f948"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user/#a48ec5fcee6d2c17c723e8e67f169f948">dropAllReferences</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
